content: 3 and 4 the feet / shoes with and without shoe laces just lace the white thread i like to use 2 strands of a 4 ply yarn for detail sewing to look like shoe laces it s a small foot so 2 x s should be more than enough page 7 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com and lastly this is little boy with his face in place again i like to use 2 strands of a 4 ply yarn to do faces i make the eyes basically x s and the mouth is just 2 lines be creative and have fun page 8 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com
